name: eggd_somalier_relate2multiqc_v1.0.0
title: eggd_somalier_relate2multiqc
summary: Reformats somalier output somalier.samples.tsv to append predicted sex to file and it is in a suitable format for multiqc

inputSpec.name: somalier_input
inputSpec.label: Somalier samples tsv file
inputSpec.help: Output file from somalier relate, default name: somalier.samples.tsv

inputSpec.name: female_threshold
inputSpec.label: Female Threshold
inputSpec.help: A integer value for het calls threshold for females. Default is 45

inputSpec.name: male_threshold
inputSpec.label: Male Threshold
inputSpec.help: A integer value for het calls threshold for males. Default is 1

outputSpec.name: modified_somalier_output
outputSpec.label: Modified somalier samples tsv output
outputSpec.help: Modified somalier sample tsv file with corrected column ordering and appended predicted sex column and true/false reported to predicted sex column.
